thread.title: Bride Bursts Into Happy Tears When Ceremony Is Interrupted By Voice From The Pews
thread.title_full: Bride Bursts Into Happy Tears When Ceremony Is Interrupted By Voice From The Pews

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Bride Bursts Into Happy Tears When Ceremony Is Interrupted By Voice From The Pews
text:
Bride Bursts Into Happy Tears When Ceremony Is Interrupted By Voice From The Pews Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Just as the bride and groom finished exchanging their wedding vows, they were about to get a big surprise! Neil and Tricia Swan had just exchanged their marriage vows at their wedding in Kincasslagh, Co. Donegal when the priest begins to sing. Then one of their guests stands up in the audience and also begins to sing, followed by another and another! 
It turns out the bride’s friend Gavin Boyle and with a host of local celebrities – Daniel O’Donnell, Majella, Derek Ryan, Tony Kenny, Shaun Cuddy, Tony Allen and more all sang choruses of ‘How Great Thou Art’. 
Neil, Tricia and many other members of the congregation were left in tears by the end of the surprise “flash mob”. 
Share this wonderful wedding performance with your family and friends. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
